ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "Walkin") ) , OR( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Check_in_Date__c ) ) ) ,NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Purpose__c ) ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Remarks__c ) )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Do not fill the Walkin Information if Lead Source is not Walkin!
